channel.title: Error when signing .jar
channel.description:
im trying to make a new updated .jar client for server.
getting this error when trying to sign the jar.
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_07\bin\jarsigner.exe" -verbose -keystore "C:\Users\****\Desktop\JAR Maker\test" -storepass "*******" -keypass "*******" "C:\Users\****\Desktop\client.jar" "client" > jarsigner: unable to sign jar: java.io.IOException: invalid header field > Unable to sign JAR file. Caused by : jarsigner: unable to sign jar: java.io.IOException: invalid header field

item.title: Error when signing .jar
item.dc:creator: @Master_claw Master claw
item.description:
@Master_claw wrote:

im trying to make a new updated .jar client for server.

getting this error when trying to sign the jar.

“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_07\bin\jarsigner.exe” -verbose -keystore “C:\Users*\Desktop\JAR Maker\test" -storepass "" -keypass "" "C:\Users*\Desktop\client.jar” “client”

jarsigner: unable to sign jar: java.io.IOException: invalid header field
Unable to sign JAR file.
Caused by :
jarsigner: unable to sign jar: java.io.IOException: invalid header field
